headline: The Bull Case For lululemon athletica (LULU) Could Change Following Chip Wilson’s Boardroom Challenge - Learn Why
summary: In late December 2025, lululemon athletica Inc. disclosed that founder Chip Wilson plans to nominate three independent director candidates and submitted a non‑binding proposal to declassify the board, while the company reiterated internally that daily operations and its existing growth strategy remain unchanged. This move adds another layer to lululemon’s ongoing leadership transition, as the board evaluates Wilson’s nominees amid an active CEO search and pressure from activist investor...
